title: Binary ConversionBinary AndingIn
extract: An easy method of converting decimal to binary number equivalents is to write down the decimal number and to continually divide-by-2 (two) to give a result and a remainder of either a “1” or a “0” until the final result equals zero. ... This divide-by-2 method will also work for conversion to other number bases.
extract_html: An easy method of converting decimal to binary number equivalents is to write down the decimal number and to continually divide-by-2 (two) to give a result and a remainder of either a “1” or a “0” until the final result equals zero. ... This divide-by-2 method will also work for conversion to other number bases.
